scripts.setup: snarkjs ptn bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --entropy='12345' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau
scripts.build-keys: snarkjs g16s password.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/circuit.zkey && snarkjs zkev build/circuit.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.organize: cp password.wasm build/ && cp build/circuit.zkey build/password.zkey
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run build-keys && npm run organize
